ProductInfo.Features:
1/4" OV7930 CMOS Wireless Security Camera; 2.4" Color TFT-LCD Monitor/ Receiver; TV System: PAL/ NTSC; Pixel Image: NTSC: 510x492  Pal: 628x582
Sensor: Color CMOS Image Sensor; Horizontal Resolution: 380 TV Lines; Latest Ultra Digital Wireless Technology Provides; Excellent Image Quality and Clarity
Secure signal ensures complete privacy; Connect to any TV/ Monitor/ VCR/ DVD Recorder; Listen in with Exceptional Sound Clarity; True Portability with Receiver's Rechargeable Battery
Camera Can be Battery Operated for True Portable Wireless Operation; Up to 330ft (>250m) Wireless Transmission Range; Night Vision Allows for Low Light Viewing up to 10ft from Camera
Audio Level detection for LCD screen on/off; IR View Distance: 3m; Power Supply: 5V DC / 1000mA
ProductInfo.Name: Kare Brand New L024AW4 Digital Baby Monitor Wireless Ir Infant Video Talk Security Camera System with 2.4" TFT LCD Receiver
